text_block_list.name: Sakura Chiyono O
text_block_list.text:
I remember Maruzen-san saying before, 
"Mount Akagi is my holy land!♪" ――!

text_block_list.name: Sakura Chiyono O
text_block_list.text:
Wow, that slope looks like it would be a
challenging run! It might be the perfect
spot to train my stamina and power!!

text_block_list.name: Sakura Chiyono O
text_block_list.text:
Alright, for a commemorative run…! 
Fight, O-! Chiyono, O-!!
